Trade/Device Name(s): VALIDATE CM2 Calibration Verification / Linearity Test Set
VALIDATE® CM2 Calibration Verification / Linearity Test Set
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Beckman Synchron DxC with Diazyme reagent
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VALIDATE CM2 Calibration Verification / Linearity Test Set, a human serum-based calibration verification material for multiple chemistry analytes.
Indications for Use Summary: For in vitro diagnostic use in quantitative determination of linearity, calibration verification, and verification of reportable range in automated, semi-automated, and manual chemistry systems.
